```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
V <- signif(runif(1, 3, 12), 2) # voltage (V)
Q <- signif(sample(1000:6000, 1), 2) # charge (mAh)

ans <- signif(3.6 * Q * V / 1000, 2) # energy (kJ)

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, range = c(0.5, 2)*ans, delta = ans/10, format = FALSE, digits = 5)
sc$questions <- sprintf("$%g \\,\\mathsf{kJ}$", signif(sc$questions, 3))
```
Question
========
A battery is rated at $`r V` \,\mathsf{V}$ and $`r Q` \,\mathsf{mAh}$. How much
energy does the battery store at full charge?

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========
Convert to SI units and multiply the voltage by the charge:

$$E = Q V = (`r Q` \,\mathsf{mAh} \times 3.6 \,\mathsf{C / mAh})(`r V` \,\mathsf{V}) = `r ans` \,\mathsf{kJ}$$
